The lemon butter chicken from Everyday Dinners! Back at hockey! Love. Summer entertaining fridge loading. Old man Jordy enjoying the weather. I […]
text: It was a nice little week! May is just chugging along. My school drop off buddy. This week was teacher appreciation week! Lots of snacks for the teacher’s lounge. After school sibling scoot. The lemon butter chicken from Everyday Dinners! Back at hockey! Love. Summer entertaining fridge loading. Old man Jordy enjoying the weather. I love this. Curls! They celebrated Jordan’s birthday in school this week since he has a summer birthday. Emilia had a spring musical show, a pajama party! It was SO cute. Super cute! And right before we got to watch the new pope being announced on the big screen! It was amazing. More curls for the night show. Baby BFF buddies. My favorite girl. Friday afterschool treat of pizza and games with friends. Jordan is just getting the hang of it all. Everyday obsession. Hockey forever. Fun with baby Lucy!! Frozen cherry coke for mother’s day! And it’s popsicle on the porch season. Yay!
html:
It was a nice little week!

May is just chugging along.

My school drop off buddy.

This week was teacher appreciation week!

Lots of snacks for the teacher’s lounge.

After school sibling scoot.

The lemon butter chicken from Everyday Dinners!

Back at hockey!

Love.

Summer entertaining fridge loading.

Old man Jordy enjoying the weather.

I love this.

Curls!

They celebrated Jordan’s birthday in school this week since he has a summer birthday.

Emilia had a spring musical show, a pajama party! It was SO cute.

Super cute! And right before we got to watch the new pope being announced on the big screen! It was amazing.

More curls for the night show.

Baby BFF buddies.

My favorite girl.

Friday afterschool treat of pizza and games with friends.

Jordan is just getting the hang of it all.

Everyday obsession.

Hockey forever.

Fun with baby Lucy!!

Frozen cherry coke for mother’s day!

And it’s popsicle on the porch season. Yay!
